scripts.text:
DECLARE @PackageExecutionLogId AS INT
, @PackageName AS VARCHAR(250) = 'TestPackage'
, @BatchRunId AS INT = 100
, @PackageID AS VARCHAR(250) = 'TestPackageId'
, @ETLType AS VARCHAR(50) = 'DeltaLoad'
, @PValidFromDate AS VARCHAR(50) = '31/08/2022'
, @SSISDBPackageExecutionId INT = 200

EXEC @PackageExecutionLogId = Audit.USP_InsertPackageExecutionLog @PackageName,@BatchRunId,@PackageID,@ETLType,@SSISDBPackageExecutionId

SELECT PackageExecutionLogId = @PackageExecutionLogId
 ,ValidFromDate = ISNULL(TRY_CAST(TRIM(@PValidFromDate) AS DATETIME),GETDATE())
